title: Settings
name: Setting
warning: Warning! Changing main currency might cause incorrect cost calculations for previously entered data. Removing active currencies that were actively being used might also cause data corruption. We don't recommend changing main currency and removing active currencies after you have entered any cost data.
warningInitialSetup: Warning! Please choose carefully and try not to change currency settings after the initial setup. Doing so may cause incorrect calculations and data corruption.

form.apiKeyAlt: If selected service requires an api key, please provide it
form.apiAlt: Remote exchange rate provider for currency conversions
form.selectedCurrenciesAlt: Choose most commonly used currencies in your business.
form.defaultCurrencyAlt: Choose the default currency for your business
